title: Max Level Miscellaneous Character - Novel Updates
tags: Army   Assassins   Beasts   Blacksmith   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Demons   Destiny   Discrimination   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elves   Evil Religions   Eye Powers   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Knights   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Modern Knowledge   Mythology   Near-Death Experience   Necromancer   Nobles   Orcs   Pirates   Priests   Racism   Religions   Shield User   Spear Wielder   Spirit Users   Spirits   Strong to Stronger   Survival   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Wars   World Tree
author: 케이로드
description:
I have been in this strange land for too long. Now the memories of my hometown have faded, only to be replaced with useless memories.
This damn world was once a game. I don’t know if the game became a reality or if I was just pretending this world to be a game, but it’s either one of that.

In the game that became reality, no one could believe it,
In order to survive, I had no choice but to become a miscellaneous character.

As the water got colder, Ivan’s mood also got colder.
That day, Ivan used the cost of one robber’s life for lodging and bathing.>
